results.content: Clear and concise explanation. Very educational content
results.content_html: Clear and concise explanation. Very educational content

results.content:
Course is up-to-date! The instructor has a pretty sound and enjoyable delivery, I have been able to understand everything so far, which is admirable because GraphQL can be quite confusing when starting out. 

Minor constructive criticism for the instructor, he tends to say 'uhhh' 'uhhh' quite a lot. Personally I don't really mind, but I can imagine that some people might find it annoying, and it makes the lectures come across less professional.

This course definitely deserves more students. It's a shame that Udemy seems to favour established instructors that don't even bother to update the content of their course (but claim their course was updated yesterday). 

People (myself included) tend to go for the course with the highest numbers of students and ratings. So it seems very hard for new instructors to gain any foothold in terms of student numbers. It's sad to see that a course of this quality that took many hours to create only has 440 students. Udemy should do more for new content creators. I am glad I stumbled across this course. I learned a lot!

results.content: Clean, concise and easy to understand!
Curso muito bom, superou minhas expectativas

The tutor is on point with his codes, he explains very well about the code his writing.

Another thing which i love is, his making user that his code is available on every step of the course.

His code is very straightforward, you can detach the given components, without breaking the App, like you can move functions around as you like.

And i am only on the 1st course which is "basics", i love it :D

results.content: By far the best React + GraphQL course on Udemy! Clearly explained, well executed, appropriate in length but most importantly... UP TO DATE!!! There are so many GraphQL courses which are so out of date. I can't stress enough, don't buy the "best selling" GraphQL course as its 4 years out of date, buy this course instead!

There are so many GraphQL courses which are so out of date. I can't stress enough, don't buy the "best selling" GraphQL course as its 4 years out of date, buy this course instead!

results.content: A very thorough graphql course. It comprehensively covers how to set up graphql server-side but also explains how to use graphql with React, client side. This was a must for me. Alot of the technology around graphql is changing pretty rapidly. This is probably the most up to date course I have seen on Udemy.

results.content: I believe that Fernando is a very good teacher and has some really sound projects that are good enough to expound upon and be placed in a portfolio. This course is right on point for me...though I wish he would answer questions or redo some of the other React project courses...other than that this course is rather good and has far exceeded my expectations :)
